specialContainmentProcedure:
SCP-005 poses no immediate risk,
but requires approval from Level 4 personnel for removal from containment.
description:
SCP-005 resembles a key from the 1920s.
It has the unique ability to open any lock, mechanical or digital,
though the origin of this ability is unknown.
additionalNotes:
SCP-005 may only be used under supervision of Level 4 personnel.
It is forbidden for personal use or non-essential purposes.

appendix.title: Appendix A: Locking Mechanism Behavior
appendix.content:
SCP-005 can open most locks,
but disguised locks may sometimes prevent it from working.
Experiments suggest SCP-005 may be tentatively classified as 'sentient,'
though further tests are required to confirm its cognitive abilities.
